anti-aliasing.name: Anti-aliasing
anti-aliasing.description: The model smooths aliasing artifacts (also called jaggies).

colorization.name: Colorization
colorization.description: The model colorizes grayscale and/or black-and-white images.

dds.name: DDS
dds.description:
The model is able to remove DDS block compression artifacts. 

Models with this tag may only support specific compression methods and/or settings (e.g. BC1/DTX1, BC7).

debanding.name: Debanding
debanding.description: The removes banding artifacts caused by color quantization. Such artifacts and frequently be observed in GIF images.

deblur.name: Deblur
deblur.description: The model tries to remove blur from the input.

dedither.name: Dedither
dedither.description: The model removes dithering artifacts from the input.

dehalo.name: Dehalo
dehalo.description: The model removes haloing and color bleeding from the input.

denoise.name: Denoise
denoise.description:
The model removes noise from the input.

Models with this tag may only work with specific kinds of noise.

general-upscaler.name: General Upscaler
general-upscaler.description:
The model can upscale any subject.

General purpose models achieve good results across a wide range of inputs. However, models that specialize in the subject of a specific image (e.g. anime, faces, text, etc.) will typically achieve better results than general purpose models.

inpainting.name: Inpainting
inpainting.description: The model fills in selected parts of an image.

jpeg.name: JPEG
jpeg.description:
The model is able to remove JPEG compression artifacts.

Models with this tag may only support specific JPEG compression settings (e.g. quality between 80% and 100%).

pretrained.name: Pretrained
pretrained.description: The model is intended to be used to train new models.

color:1.name: Grayscale
color:1.description: The model upscales grayscale images. A typical example for grayscale models are models that upscale the alpha channel of images.

color:1-3.name: Grayscaleâ†’RGB
color:1-3.description: The model colorizes grayscale images to RGB.

color:3.name: RGB
color:3.description: The model upscales images without transparency. Some applications (e.g. chaiNNer and CupScale) can still upscale images with transparency using this model.

color:4.name: RGBA
color:4.description: The model upscales images with transparency.

helper:invalid-channels.name: Invalid channels
helper:invalid-channels.description: The number of input or output channels of the model is not valid.

helper:invalid-date.name: Invalid date
helper:invalid-date.description: The model has no date or its date is invalid.

helper:invalid-scale.name: Invalid scale
helper:invalid-scale.description: The scale of the model is not valid.

license:by.name: Credit
license:by.description:
Crediting the author is **required** when sharing the model or derivative works (e.g. model interpolations).

Simply using the model to upscale images is typically okay, and no credit is required for upscaled images.

license:commercial.name: Commercial
license:commercial.description: The model may be included and used in commercial products.

license:modifications.name: Modifications
license:modifications.description: The author allows that this model may be used to create derivative works (e.g. model interpolations).

license:no-license.name: No License
license:no-license.description: The model is not licensed by the author.

license:sa.name: Same license
license:sa.description: The author **requires** that derivative works have the same license or a compatible license as the model. Derivative works include model interpolations and using it a pretrained model.

license:unknown.name: Unknown License
license:unknown.description: The model is licensed under a custom or infrequently used license.
